docTitle.titlePart: MY LIFE IN THE SERVICE THE DIARY OF John M. Slocum 0-888363

figure.figDesc: A cut out photograph of John Slocum lying in a cot with a caption to the right
figure.p: This begins a short story of the horror of modern war. Author at extreme left; in full battle dress, at the front.

div.head: Jan 12, 1943 - Rockhampton
div.p: Went on 3 hour alert this afternoon and as rumor has it, we are to leave for New Guinea in two days. Busy Packing all personal and Co. gear.

div.head: Jan 13, 1943
div.p: Turned in all our equipment today and drew jungle gear. Hamocks, Machetti, sheath knife, zoot suit, parkas, medical kit, and so forth. Looks like N.G. for sure now.

div.head: Jan 14, 1943
div.p: Loaded gear into trucks and then onto train. Next stop is Gladstone. I wonder if we are headed for N.G.? Arrived Port Elma at 2:30p.m. and began to load the good ship Tasman. I have charge of the #3 hold and I'm going now to get it loaded. We just finished loading and it is now 2:30 A Jan 15.

div.head: Jan 15, 1943
div.p: I went to bed at 3:00 AM this morning and it is now 9:30 A. We are about 10 miles off shore and the sea is calm. We are just entering the passage way between the mainland and the Great Barrier Reef. It is now 6:30 PM. We had beans, tea, and crackers for supper. Sky is overcast, no Japanese planes today.

div.head: Jan 16, 1943
div.p: Sky still overcast, weather and sea both calm. I am to be gunnery officer for the ship. I have 4 - .50 cal. M.G.; 1 - 3 inch; and two 37mm guns. Sixteen men + 1 NCO on the .50 cal's. 1 N.C.O. and 12 men on the 3 inch. 4 NCO's and 20 men on the 37 mm's. All of the men are from Recon Co.

div.head: Jan 17, 1943
div.p: Food still not so good. Had target practice with all the guns this morning. The ships 4 water cooled .50's also fired and the noise was terrific but comforting. I fired one round from the port side 37mm and was very lucky. There was a orange box floating about 700 yds off our port side and everyone to a shot at it. When I fired my one round I hit it dead center and it blew up in a flash of flame. If I could do that again I hope we meet surfaced sub. He would not have a chance.
